channel.title: UDK on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in UDK on Life Reboot

item.title: CryEngine3 and UDK3
item.description: I’ve been playing games for over 30 years now and I’ve seen them progress from simple text based games through all the iterations to give us the amazing looking games we have today. I have at times written my own games; most were very simple - due to the nature of the machines at the time.
